faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: How do I make a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can make a reservation through the app by selecting your preferred parking facility, date, and time. You can choose to reserve a specific slot or a general spot.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: Can I cancel a reservation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your reservation directly from the app's 'My Reservations' section. Please refer to our cancellation policy for any associated fees.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: How far in advance can I book?
faqs.answer: You can book a reservation up to 30 days in advance.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: What if I am late for my reservation?
faqs.answer: Reservations are held for a grace period of 15 minutes. After this time, your slot may be released to another user.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: How do I modify my reservation details?
faqs.answer: You can modify the date, time, or vehicle on an existing reservation in the 'My Reservations' section of the app. Note that certain changes may incur a fee.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: Can I book a spot for a friend's vehicle?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can. When making a reservation, you'll have the option to enter the details of the vehicle that will be using the spot.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: For a full refund, reservations must be canceled at least 24 hours in advance. Cancellations made within 24 hours are subject to a cancellation fee.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: Do I need to create an account to reserve?
faqs.answer: Yes, you must have a registered account to make and manage reservations.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: How do I view my upcoming reservations?
faqs.answer: All your upcoming and past reservations are listed in the 'My Reservations' tab in your profile.

faqs.name: Reservations
faqs.question: What happens if my reservation is a no-show?
faqs.answer: If you do not show up for your reservation and do not cancel, the full amount will be charged.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: How do I pay for a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can pay for your reservation directly through the app using a stored credit card, UPI, or other supported payment methods.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), debit cards, UPI, and net banking.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: Is my payment information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, all payment information is encrypted and processed through a secure gateway. We do not store your credit card details on our servers.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: How do I view my past payment history?
faqs.answer: Your complete payment history is available in the 'Payment History' section of your account profile.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: Can I get a refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed according to our cancellation policy. If you believe you were charged incorrectly, please contact support with your transaction details.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: My card was declined. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Please check your card details and try again. If the issue persists, contact your bank or try a different payment method.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: Can I add multiple cards to my account?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add and manage multiple payment methods in the 'Payment Settings' section of the app.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: Are there any extra fees for using the service?
faqs.answer: All applicable fees are included in the price shown at checkout. There are no hidden charges.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: How do I update my billing information?
faqs.answer: You can update your billing address and other information in your account settings.

faqs.name: Payment
faqs.question: Do you offer monthly payment plans?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only offer pay-per-use and reservation-based payments. Monthly plans are not available at this time.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: How do I enter the parking facility?
faqs.answer: Upon arrival, simply scan the QR code from your app at the entry gate. The gate will open automatically.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: What do I do if the gate doesn't open?
faqs.answer: If the gate does not open, ensure you are at the correct entry point and that your reservation is active. If the issue continues, use the 'Help' button to call for assistance.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: How does the system recognize my vehicle?
faqs.answer: Our system uses a combination of license plate recognition and a QR code scanner to identify your vehicle.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: Can a different vehicle use my reservation?
faqs.answer: The reservation is linked to a specific vehicle. You must update your vehicle information on the app before arriving to avoid issues at the gate.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: What's the process for exiting the parking lot?
faqs.answer: When exiting, the system will automatically scan your license plate or QR code. The gate will open, and a payment will be processed if required.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: My RFID tag is not working.
faqs.answer: If your RFID tag is not working, please use the QR code in your app to enter or exit. Contact support to get a replacement tag.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: What if I lose my QR code?
faqs.answer: Your QR code is always available in the 'My Reservations' section of the app. You can also use your license plate to enter and exit.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: Is there a time limit for vehicle entry?
faqs.answer: You must enter the facility within 15 minutes of your reservation start time. After that, your reservation may be cancelled.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: How do I report a problem with a gate?
faqs.answer: You can report a gate issue by pressing the help button at the gate or by contacting our support line.

faqs.name: InAndOut
faqs.question: What if I park in the wrong spot?
faqs.answer: Parking in a spot other than the one you reserved may result in a fine. Please ensure you park in your assigned slot.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: How do I book a specific slot?
faqs.answer: When making a reservation, you can select 'Book Specific Slot' and choose your preferred spot on the map.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: Can I book a slot for a specific time?
faqs.answer: Yes, our system allows you to book a slot for a specific date and time duration.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: How to find available slots on the map?
faqs.answer: The app's map displays real-time availability. Slots marked in green are available for booking.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: Can I change my booked slot after booking?
faqs.answer: You can change your booked slot up to 30 minutes before your reservation starts, subject to availability.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: What is the difference between booking a slot and a reservation?
faqs.answer: Booking a slot refers to reserving a specific numbered spot, whereas a reservation secures a parking space in general.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: How do I know my slot is confirmed?
faqs.answer: You will receive a confirmation email and an in-app notification with your slot details after a successful booking.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: Can I book a slot for more than one day?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can book a slot for multiple days. Simply select the dates and times for your entire stay during the booking process.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: What if someone else is in my booked slot?
faqs.answer: Please contact a parking attendant or use the app to report the issue. Do not park in another slot to avoid a fine.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: Is there a maximum booking duration?
faqs.answer: The maximum booking duration is 7 consecutive days.

faqs.name: SlotBooking
faqs.question: How do I check the status of my booked slot?
faqs.answer: You can check the real-time status of your booked slot in the 'My Bookings' section of the app.
